about.aboutDescription: I am Imanol Augusto Peralta, a software developer specialized in Front-End. Since childhood, I have been passionate about technology and development, which led me to build a creative profile with a strong interest in digital design. I combine my technical knowledge with design skills to create attractive, functional web interfaces focused on user experience. Currently, I work on developing websites and web applications that aim to deliver visual impact and usability, always with an innovative approach. I am motivated by new challenges that drive my professional growth and allow me to provide creative and effective solutions for companies and projects I collaborate on.
